alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:53PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oglala Lakota and east central Fall River Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 452 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Oelrichs, or 21 miles north of Chadron, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Prairie Winds Casino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
